name: yieldagentx
description: ðŸš€ AI-Powered DeFi Automation Platform with Chainlink Integration - Chainlink Block Magic Hackathon 2025 Submission

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:ai && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ai && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:contracts && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:ai
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Deploy frontend to Vercel'
scripts.deploy:ai: cd ai && npm run build && echo 'Deploy AI service to Vercel'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:ai && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf artifacts cache node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:ai
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:ai
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: echo 'YieldAgentX setup complete! Run npm run dev:all to start all services.'

author: YieldAgentX Team
